/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
